long_description: Suitable for all dogs, the Hurtta padded Y-harness is especially great for dogs with back and neck problems. This harness distributes pressure evenly across the chest, protecting your dog's vertebrae. Wide, padded straps and an ergonomic design provide reliable comfort without causing wear on your dog's fur or skin. Armpit padding stays in place even during rapid movement, providing protection from the clip buckle. Dogs and owners alike will quickly become accustomed to this harness with its simple and easy-to-fasten design. The Hurtta padded Y-harness is made of durable neoprene material and features reflective 3M accents for enhanced visibility in low light. Note: please click on the Size Chart link next to the Color/Size menu for detailed fit information.
short_description: Suitable for all dogs, the Hurtta padded Y-harness is especially great for dogs with back and neck problems. This harness distributes pressure evenly across the chest, protecting your dog's vertebrae.
